titleStmt.title: The life and death of Mahomet the conquest of Spaine together with the rysing and ruine of the Sarazen Empire. Written by Sr. Walter Raleigh Kt.
titleStmt.author: Raleigh, Walter, Sir, 1552?-1618.
Luna, Miguel de, 16th/17th cent. Verdadera historia del rey Don Rodrigo.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R[alph] H[odgkinson] for Daniel Frere, and are to be sold at the red-Bull in little-Brittain,

notesStmt.note: "Mostly compiled from 'La verdadera historia del Rey Don Rodrigo .. compuesta por .. Abulcacim Tarif Abentarique' [i.e. Miguel de Luna]"--Folger catalogue.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A1".
Running title reads: The history of Mahomet.
